title: Provides that the salaries of the public administrators of the counties within the city of New York shall be at least 90% of salary of surrogate's court judges
summary: Provides that the salaries of the public administrators of the counties within the city of New York shall be at least ninety percent of the salary of surrogate's court judges.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1047

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. PHEFFER -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Judiciary

       AN ACT to amend the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to  the
         compensation of the public administrators

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 1 of section  1105  of  the  surrogate's  court
    2  procedure act, as amended by chapter 751 of the laws of 2004, is amended
    3  to read as follows:
    4    1.  The  public  administrators of the counties comprising the city of
    5  New York shall receive at  least  [two-thirds]  NINETY  PERCENT  of  the
    6  amount paid to the judges of the surrogate's court of the counties with-
    7  in the city of New York.
    8    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the thirtieth day after it shall
    9  have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00366-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to the compensation of the public administrators
